Desc.eng: Let’s get to work, shall we? First we are going to need power, which is produced by a certain machine called the Elyctrical Generator. Or so I’ve been told. Which is broken, unfortunately.
But do you know how to fix it?
Me? What am I, a grease-monkey? I’m wearing a cape, see? What we need here is a true adept of mechanical wonders.
And I suppose you know just the man?
Yes. The trouble is that the professional in question is imprisoned in the factory by those miserable wind-up soldiers.
A task tailored for Van Helsing!
I’m still here, you know that, right?
If I might suggest, take the Inkgate that leads right behind the walls of force!
